posts.post_content:
I'm trying to assemble a set of Boston A.L. T204 Ramly's in SGC 10 condition.  I have a few graded higher that I'd be interested in trading down from.  If you have a SGC 10 if any of these and would consider upgrading, shoot me a PM.  Here is what I have:

Harry Lord SGC 30
Bill Carigan SGC 30
Jiggs Donahue SGC 50

Also looking for (SGC 10 only):
Arrelanes
Cicotte
Gessler
Niles
Spencer

Thanks,
Scott.
